contact.alertSent: Your message has been sent. We will contact you soon.

contact.heroSubtitle: We are here to answer your questions and support your projects.
contact.contactDetailsText: Feel free to contact us by phone, email or visit our offices.
contact.sendMessageText: Fill out this form and we will get back to you as soon as possible.

servicesPage.mainSubtitle: With NISATEL, benefit from full support from design to maintenance of your infrastructure, along with innovative telecom solutions to optimize your communications.

etudes.title: Design Office
etudes.description: Our design office offers tailor-made solutions adapted to each customer's specifications (CCTP).
features: Technical studies for pylon sizing according to standards (EUROCODES, BAEL, CM66, NV65, DTU...)
Structural and civil engineering sizing (foundations, reinforcements, anchors...)
Load studies and feasibility opinions on existing structures
Reinforcement solutions to increase load capacity
Specialized software: ROBOT STRUCTURAL ANALYSIS, SOLIDWORKS, AUTOCAD

fabrication.title: Manufacturing
fabrication.description: All our products are manufactured in-house in our 3500m² factory located in Témara.
features: Boilermaking and welding by qualified professionals
Hot-dip galvanization by our historical partner
Quality control at every stage of production
Ability to respond to specific and urgent requests

installation.title: On-site Installation
installation.description: Our teams ensure the installation of our products throughout the national territory.
features: Delivery and assembly by certified personnel
Lifting by crane or helicopter for difficult sites

maintenance.title: Maintenance
maintenance.description: We offer technical services for all types of metal structures.
features: Post-fire, vandalism or weather damage expertise

servicesPage.telecomSubtitle: With NISATEL, you have access to a wide range of telecom equipment, services, and consulting to optimize your performance and reduce costs.

installation.title: Telecom Network Installation
installation.description: Complete deployment of telecom infrastructures tailored to your specific needs.

maintenance.title: Telecom Network Maintenance
maintenance.description: Preventive and corrective maintenance to ensure service continuity.

voip.title: IP & VOIP Telephony
voip.description: IP telephony solutions with PABX/IPBX for unified communication.

mobilite.title: Intra/Inter-site Mobility
mobilite.description: Managing mobile communications between different geographic sites.

convergence.title: Fixed/Mobile Convergence
convergence.description: Seamless integration between your fixed and mobile telephony systems.

interphone.title: Intercom & Access Control
interphone.description: Communication and security systems for physical access.

cti.title: Telephony-IT Coupling
cti.description: CTI integration to optimize your business processes.

pylonesPage.title: Our Towers
pylonesPage.subtitle: Discover our full range of towers designed to meet all your telecommunications and antenna infrastructure needs.

products.title: Self-Supporting Towers
products.description: Self-supporting towers provide maximum stability without the need for guy wires. Ideal for urban environments and confined sites.

products.title: Guyed Towers
products.description: Guyed towers use cables for stability, offering a cost-effective solution for great heights.

products.title: Monotube Towers
products.description: Compact and aesthetic, monotube towers are perfectly suited for urban or visually sensitive areas.

about.title: NISATEL - Moroccan Telecom Expertise
about.description1: Founded in 2016, NISATEL is an independent Moroccan company specialized in the development, manufacturing and installation of towers and telecommunication infrastructures. We work closely with radio network owners, developers and operators to provide customized solutions.
about.description2: Our 3500m² factory in Témara and our integrated design office allow us to master the entire value chain, from design to installation.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide our daily actions
items: We undertake every day to build the networks of tomorrow and create a world of sustainable progress...
We learn humbly from each other to give our best.

services.title: Our Key Services
services.subtitle: Complete solutions for your telecommunications needs

items.title: Design Office
items.description: Custom design according to EUROCODES, BAEL, CM66 standards with our specialized software (ROBOT STRUCTURAL ANALYSIS, SOLIDWORKS).

items.title: Manufacturing
items.description: Production in our 3500m² factory in Témara by qualified boilermakers and welders, with hot-dip galvanizing.

items.title: Maintenance
items.description: Inspection visits, post-incident expertise and reinforcement solutions to extend the life of your installations.

partnerSection.title: Our reliable partner
partnerSection.description: Dowslake designs, manufactures and sells intelligent network equipment from 2 Mbps to 40 Gbps, covering Ethernet, optical transport for metro networks and access networks.

technicalSolutions.title: Professional Technical Solutions
technicalSolutions.subtitle: Custom infrastructures to meet your specific needs

solutions.title: PROFESSIONAL WIFI
description: Mobility has become a competitive advantage; your employees spend more than half of their working time away from their desks. To combine flexibility and mobility, Nisatel deploys custom, high-speed, secure and reliable WIFI networks.
With Nisatel, you choose the latest generation WIFI solutions, high-performance and compliant with safety standards and public exposure limits to electromagnetic fields.

solutions.title: LIGHTNING PROTECTION SYSTEM
description: The lightning rod tip must be located at least two meters above the area to be protected. The receiving antennas must be connected through an isolation spark gap to the down conductors.

solutions.title: MARKING SYSTEM
description: Complete solutions for signaling and delimiting professional spaces.

solutions.title: AIR CONDITIONING
description: Reversible air conditioning systems for optimal thermal comfort and efficient energy management.
